name: AirConSoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open air con sounds”
”Alexa ask air con sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: air con sounds
des: Is it too cold out for AC but you miss the dreamy sounds of your Air Con system that help you drift to sleep? Get started by saying, 'Alexa, open Air Con Sounds,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of sound. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
